attributes.action: Halt all immigration into the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK is only a small Island and is one of the most congested countries in the world. Immigration has put a strain on our housing,health service,schools, public transport, and jobs. Crime is out of control.

rejection.details: Too similar to an existing petition http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/refuges/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
